name: Robot FlameDragon:Amazing Toy Fight
description:
You should very fast at every step, otherwise you are difficult to pass!

Players need to assemble the parts of the Robot Flame Dragon, and then you will see how powerful the Robot Flame Dragon!!

Like solve the puzzle? Like awesome bots fight? Robot Flame Dragon is the one for you.
Let's try to play this robot game, it is amazing!

Now, we also joined the rank list! Let us and friends than the speed of it!
